articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: Google launches Doppl, a new app that lets you visualize how an outfit might look on you - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google is launching a new experimental app called Doppl that uses AI to visualize how different outfits might look on you.
articles.content: Google is launching a new experimental app called Doppl that uses AI to visualize how different outfits might look on you, the company announced on Thursday. The app is available on iOS and Android i… [+1963 chars]
